t: Amazon rebrands Amazon Go Grocery to Amazon Fresh, closes Seattle-area store near Microsoft HQ – GeekWire
s: May 18, 2021 - The company next month will transition employees from the Redmond Amazon Go Grocery location to the new Amazon Fresh store opening in the Factoria neighborhood in Bellevue, Wash .— one of two Amazon Fresh locations in the Seattle area.

3 weeks ago - Some Amazon Fresh stores use "grab and go" or "Just Walk Out" technology similar to that in Amazon Go stores, which tracks what customers take and place back. It allows customers to skip conventional checkouts while also eliminating the need to use Dash Carts.

Amazon Fresh offers Amazon Dash Cart, which helps make a quick shopping trip even quicker by allowing you to skip the checkout line. You can ask Alexa, at various locations throughout the store, to help you quickly find items while you shop.

t: Amazon Fresh needs to find its identity
s: March 9, 2025 - Consolidate and expand their non WFM brands for Fresh. While at the same time reducing the national brands they are not making enough margin on. Private labels are doing well nationally. Amazon Basics, Happy Belly and Aplenty should have a much larger presence at Fresh.

t: Amazon Fresh Moves Closer to Opening Date | Citrus Heights Messenger
s: Construction of Amazon Fresh, a new grocery store concept from Amazon.com, is quickly nearing completion in Sunrise Village at Madison Avenue and Sunrise Boulevard in Citrus Heights.
